title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.6 - Proper entry upon facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.6 - Proper entry upon facilities

State Regulations

Entry upon the facilities except at the toll plazas
designated for such purposes is prohibited, without regard to intent to evade
tolls. Violators shall be assessed for tolls properly payable in accordance
with the bridge toll rate schedule. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5703.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
